title: Calories in Cayman Jack Margarita
meta_description: Discover calories in Cayman Jack Margarita per serving, including carbs, sugars, alcohol content, and nutrition breakdowns for this ready-to-drink cocktail.
assumptions: Per 355 ml (12 oz) can, ready-to-drink; values based on standard formulation with tequila, lime, and triple sec flavors; no added ice or garnishes.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, serving size, and brand specifics; alcohol content affects calorie count. Check product labels for exact details.

quick_answer.text: One 355 ml serving of Cayman Jack Margarita contains about 190 kcal, mostly from alcohol and carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with product packaging.

tweaks.label: Add fresh lime wedge and salt rim
Mix with 4 oz soda water for lighter version

faqs.q: How many calories in one Cayman Jack Margarita?
What are the carbs in Cayman Jack Margarita?
faqs.a: About 15 g carbs and 10 g sugars per serving, mainly from mixers.

faqs.q: Does Cayman Jack Margarita have protein or fat?
faqs.a: No significant protein or fat; it's primarily alcohol and carbs.

faqs.q: How does alcohol affect calories in Cayman Jack Margarita?
faqs.a: Alcohol contributes ~7 kcal per gram; this serving has about 5% ABV.

faqs.q: Can I find lower calorie alternatives to Cayman Jack Margarita?
faqs.a: Yes, opt for light versions or dilute with zero-calorie mixers to reduce calories.
